short_summary: to provide the service of modification to the maintenance platform at bagotville, qc
description: this solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation of offers number w0138-23a079 dated december 11, 2023 with a closing of january 18, 2024 at 14:00 est. the service will be provided on behalf of the department of national defence for the modification of the maintenance platforms at bagotville, qc
full_summary:
=====================================

**Contract Opportunity**

### Title {#title}

**English**: Service for Modifications to the Maintenance Platforms
**French**: Service de modifications aux plateformes de maintenance

### Reference Number {#reference-number}

WS4334670024-Doc4426028667

### Solicitation Number {#solicitation-number}

WS4334670024

### Tender Opening {#tender-opening}

*   **Publication Date**: 2024-02-02
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-21 at 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date**: 2024-03-15

### Contract Details {#contract-details}

*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: None
*   **Procurement Category**: Service

### Request

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), for service modifications to the maintenance platforms in Saguenay.

### Important Dates {#important-dates}

*   **Publication Date**: 2024-02-02
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-21 at 14:00:00

### Solicitation Information {#solicitation-information}

*   **Solicitation Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Contact {#tender-contact}

*   **Name**: Lavoie, Corine (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email**: <corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

### Invitation URL {#invitation-url}

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18694682?extsite=MTg2OTQ2ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Description

The solicitation of offers is inviting qualified suppliers to provide service modifications to the maintenance platforms in Saguenay. The full requirements are outlined in the solicitation document. Interested suppliers are to submit a proposal before the closing date outlined in the notice. Any queries or concerns may be directed to the contact person. The successful supplier will be notified after the closing date. All works are to be in accordance with the requirements outlined in the solicitations. Suppliers are encouraged to provide
